Package com.islandpower.configurator.service

Class OneUserDetailService

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.service.OneUserDetailService
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
@Service public class OneUserDetailService extends Object implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
Service class for handling user-related operations and security details. This class implements the UserDetailsService interface and provides methods for managing user information and authentication.
